name: Chronos Fox
description:
Chrono Fox, this is Bernart the Bear speaking. Now im going to give you a brief summary of this mission, you will enter a time machine that will teleport you to the time before the disaster happened.

You will spawn in a junkyard area where you will jump across the concrete to reach a certain point. Beware there are alot of traveling agent from across the time line dressed up as a construction worker, you will fend them off or they will block you from succeding. You will equipped with a time slowing clock hidden beneath your robe, with it you can slow time for a period of time, use that to dodge or even eliminate the enemy. You also have the super plumber technique where you can stomp the enemy to eliminate them. This will be a challange for you Fox, because the terrain is designed to stop you. Believe in yourself and try not to die, I will see you in the mission.

RAION TURU:
- Alexius Andrianno Alfa Renanta (Game Designer)
- Abdan Nur Fikri (Game Programmer)
- Satrio Pinilih (Game Artist)

(NB: For those who can't play gracefully:)

- Right Click Mouse for time Control

- Left Click Mouse for Dash

- SHIFT for Wall Climb

- SPACE for you know what
